org.apache.accumulo.server.monitor

Class LogService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
      • org.apache.accumulo.server.monitor.LogService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler

    public class LogService
extends org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
    Hijack log4j and capture log events for display.

        public static void startLogListener(AccumuloConfiguration conf,
                    String instanceId,
                    String hostAddress)
        Place the host:port advertisement for the Monitor's Log4j listener in ZooKeeper
        Parameters:
        conf - configuration for the instance
        instanceId - instanceId for the instance
        hostAddress - Address that monitor process is bound to
